title: 4 Rare 80s Albums [Part 17]
description:
Sharing another four records from the 80s, kind of hard to find. These records kept playing on my ipod this past week so they are my picks! However this weekend I promise to post all your requested records!


Comateens - Pictures on A String [1983]

01 Get Off My Case  (3:23)
02 The Late Mistake  (2:29)
03 Ice Machine  (3:53) 
04 Comateens  (3:31)
05 Pictures on a String  (5:07) 
06 Garbanzo  (1:38)
07 Uptown  (2:46)
08 Cinnamon  (2:46)
09 Cold Eyes  (4:43)
10 Desert Song  (2:52)
11 Donna  (2:37)
12 Crime Time  (3:30)
 
Comateens: Nic North (bass, vocals), Ramona Jan (guitar, 1978-80), Lyn Byrd (vocals, synthesizer), Oliver North (guitar)


Original Mirrors - Original Mirrors

01 Sharp Words (4:28) 
02 Reflections (4:09)
03 The Boys the Boys (3:28) 
04 Flying (4:04)
05 Chains of Love (4:02) 
06 Could This Be Heaven? (5:10) 
07 Boys Cry (2:35)
08 Nights of the Angels (3:38) 
09 Panic in the Night (3:18)
10 Feel Like a Train (4:40)

Original Mirrors: Steve Allen (vocals), Ian Broudie (guitar), Phil Spalding (bass), Jonathan Perkins (keyboards), Peter Kircher (drums)


Polyrock - Changing Hearts [1981]

01 Changing Hearts (2:55) 
02 Love Song (4:46) 
03 Quiet Spot (1:26) 
04 Cries and Whispers (3:31) 
05 Mean Cow (2:29) 
06 In Full Circle (3:43) 
07 Like Papers on a Rack (3:29) 
08 The New U.S. (3:54) 
09 Slow Dogs (3:46) 
10 Hallways (2:24)
11 Rain (4:00)

Polyrock: Lenny Aaron (keyboards), Curt Cosentino (bass machine, synthesizer), Catherine Oblasney (vocals, percussion), Billy Robertson (guitar, vocals), Tommy Robertson (guitars, electronics, violin), Joseph Yannece (drums, percussion, backing vocals)


The Thought - The Thought [1983]

 
01 There's A Boy (3:34) 
02 Rebels (4:40) 
03 The Prince Of Darkness (4:27) 
04 These Days (2:37) 
05 Anger (5:02) 
06 I Had Too Much To Dream Last Night (3:36) 
07 Atlanta Threat (4:11) 
08 Echoes Of The Unknown Voices (3:17) 
09 Darkness Still Calls (5:27) 
10 Stop Stand Still (2:13)

The Thought: Cock De Jong, Rob Marienus, Rob Van Zandvoort, Wieb Zigtema
